mapper.select: select li.inventory_log_idx as inventoryLogIdx, l.inventory_type as inventoryType, li.company_info_idx as companyInfoIdx, ci.company_info_name as companyInfoName, ci.company_info_license_number as companyInfoLicenseNumber, li.amount, li.transaction_type as transactionType, li.transaction_date as transactionDate, li.admin_username as adminUsername from inventory_log as li inner join inventory as l on li.inventory_idx = l.inventory_idx inner join company_info as ci on li.company_info_idx = ci.company_info_idx
